job_title: Senior Software Developer - C#, .Net 8, Angular, Azure
job_purpose: To lead specific project initiatives, develop work products, mentor junior developers, and contribute to consulting projects using cutting-edge technologies like .Net 8, Angular, and Azure.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Develop work products and lead project initiatives
Mentor junior developers and conduct peer reviews
Develop software solutions using .Net 8, Angular, and Azure
Receive pay increases quarterly based on performance
company_name: Award-winning tech consultancy specializing in Digital Applications innovation on Azure
company_details: Started around 8 years ago, distinguished Microsoft partner, flat hierarchy, inclusive culture, emphasis on upskilling developers with personal development days, company-paid exams, and rewards for passing exams.
